title: Policy on project loans after RBI final rules, says SBI
description: “The idea to insert a clause with explicit mention of passing it on to the borrower is in line with RBI’s strict stance of making loan documents transparent,” said one of the persons cited above. Secondly, when the regulator increases provisioning norms so sharply, it expects banks to pass them to the borrower, otherwise the purpose of raising the provision is defeated, he added.
